code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Calendar from'react-calendar';import axios from'axios';import'react-calendar/dist/Calendar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminCalendar=()=>{const[selectedDate,setSelectedDate]=useState(new Date());const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[desc,setDesc]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/calendar/all').then(res=>setEvents(res.data));},[]);const handleCreateEvent=async()=>{const createdBy=localStorage.getItem('userId');await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/calendar/create',{title,description:desc,date:selectedDate,createdBy});setTitle('');setDesc('');const res=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/calendar/all');setEvents(res.data);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDCC5 Admin Calendar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Calendar,{onChange:setSelectedDate,value:selectedDate}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Add Event on ",selectedDate.toDateString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),placeholder:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:desc,onChange:e=>setDesc(e.target.value),placeholder:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCreateEvent,children:"Add Event"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Upcoming Events"}),events.map(e=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:new Date(e.date).toDateString()}),": ",e.title," \u2014 ",e.description]},e._id))]});};export default AdminCalendar;
